file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: '1.0'
  title: Serverless Todo Demo
paths:
  /todos:
    post:
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        httpMethod: POST
        type: aws_proxy
        uri:
          'Fn::Sub': "arn:aws:apigateway:${AWS::Region}:lambda:path/2015-03-31/functions/${ApiAddTodoFunction.Arn}/invocations"
      responses:
        '201':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ToDo'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/ToDo'
    get:
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        httpMethod: POST
        type: aws_proxy
        uri:
          'Fn::Sub': "arn:aws:apigateway:${AWS::Region}:lambda:path/2015-03-31/functions/${ApiListTodosFunction.Arn}/invocations"
      responses:
        '200':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ToDoList'
  '/todos/{id}':
    parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        description: The id of the task
    put:
      x-amazon-apigateway-integration:
        httpMethod: POST
        type: aws_proxy
        uri:
          'Fn::Sub': "arn:aws:apigateway:${AWS::Region}:lambda:path/2015-03-31/functions/${ApiUpdateTodoFunction.Arn}/invocations"
      responses:
        '200':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ToDo'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/ToDo'
components:
  responses:
    ToDo:
      description: A single ToDo entry
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ToDo'
    ToDoList:
      description: A list of ToDo entries
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ToDo'
  requestBodies:
    ToDo:
      description: A single ToDo entry
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ToDo'
  schemas:
    ToDo:
      type: object
      description: A ToDo entry
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          description: The id of the task
        text:
          type: string
          description: The task title
        state:
          type: string
          description: The state of the task
          enum:
            - OPEN
            - IN_PROGRESS
            - DONE
